FS001_ACH001.description: With Rottin'Ghoul, help Genevieve evolve the Shadow Servant in "The World Eater" .

FS001_ACH006.description: With a party of Eleanor, Viktor, and Keitha, survive 30 minutes in "Tides of the Foscari".

FS001_ACH011.description: Find the forbidden coffin in "Tides of the Foscari".

FS001_ACH012.description: With the true horror, devour everything in "The True Horror".
